title: chestcommands 咋使用全球商店啊
author: a1297866417

replies.author: lxj000
replies.txt_content:
shichang:
  COMMAND: 'market listings'
  NAME: '&d&l[++]环球市场[++] '
  LORE:
    - '点击打开'
  ID: 146
  KEEP-OPEN: true
  POSITION-X: 6
  POSITION-Y: 3

这样设置即可

' '里面的命令你修改成那个版本的打开命令即可
